events.name: 1987: Untracing the Conspiracy
events.description:
Dear friends,

Please share this post and tell your friends to come. 
That's the only way to make sure that the real stories of the ex-detainees get heard.

Our next screening (followed by Q&A with filmmaker and ex-detainees):
Sunday, 10 Dec, 2017, 2 pm

Tickets available here: http://theprojector.sg/

The Straits Times on the film: http://www.straitstimes.com/lifestyle/documentary-on-marxist-conspiracy-detainees-given-r21-rating

For more info on the film, see: http://1987untracing.wix.com/1987untracing

For updates on the making and screening of the film, join:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1987untracing/

For interview with filmmaker:
http://www.theonlinecitizen.com/2016/04/interview-jason-soo-director-1987-untracing-conspiracy/

Directions to The Projector cinema at Golden Mile Tower:

- MRT: 
Get off at Nicoll Highway Station along the Circle Line. Golden Mile Tower is a 5 min walk away. Bugis and Lavender stations are both 13 mins away.

- BUS: 
100, 961, 980, 10, 14, 16, 70, 70M, 196

Take the lifts next to the unused Box Office on the ground floor lobby at the front of the building. The Projector is on Level 5.

- DRIVING: Drive along Beach Road towards the city and look out for the sign indicating Golden Mile Tower Carpark. Park on Level 5. There's a short flight of steps that lead towards grey doors that lead into cinema foyer.
events.location: The Projector, 6001 Beach Road #05-00 Golden Mile Tower, Singapore 199589
